segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, and it's quite the sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman by the sink is polishing that plate so intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is gushing from the faucet without stopping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is full, and it's spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddles are spreading across the floor and soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it but doesn't seem to care or notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get ruined from all this water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning my attention to the kids on the other side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on that wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching deep into the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand holds a plate, maybe to steady himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out, ready to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl beside him has her arm raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's eagerly waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks so peaceful outside.
segments.speaker: PAR
